Item ID24043

The dragonstone boots can be found as a rare reward upon opening the Elven Crystal Chest within Prifddinas. They require 40 Defence to equip and have the same stats as rune boots.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3-1
 Defence bonuses
+12+13+14+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+2+0+0%+0List

The '''dragonstone boots''' can be found as a rare reward upon opening the [[Elven Crystal Chest]] within [[Prifddinas]]. They require 40 [[Defence]] to equip and have the same stats as [[rune boots]].
